articles.title: Before and after: In New England, the ‘Ugliest House in America’ gets a makeover
articles.description:
Before its transformation, Retta described the house as a “mishmosh hodgepodge color-block animal sanctuary.”

The post Before and after: In New England, the ‘Ugliest House in America’ gets a makeover appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Retta's house, dubbed the 'Ugliest House in America,' underwent a significant makeover.
The transformation highlights the potential for home renovations in New England neighborhoods.
Local residents may see increased property values due to improved aesthetics in the area.

articles.title: Seahawks star rookie injures ankle during Super Bowl LX practice
articles.description:
“He had an ankle today, we brought him in to look at it, and we’ll kind of go from here and figure out what are the next steps."

The post Seahawks star rookie injures ankle during Super Bowl LX practice appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Seahawks rookie Nick Emmanwori injured his ankle during Super Bowl LX practice.
The injury was assessed on February 5, 2026, with further steps pending.
Boston residents may see changes in Seahawks' performance affecting local Super Bowl watch parties.

articles.title: Marco Sturm blasts refs after Panthers’ ‘brutal hit’ on Charlie McAvoy
articles.description:
"I’m here to protect my guys, especially Charlie. And if you target his head, which was clear to see, that just pisses me off."

The post Marco Sturm blasts refs after Panthers’ ‘brutal hit’ on Charlie McAvoy appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marco Sturm criticized referees for not penalizing a head hit on Charlie McAvoy.
Sturm emphasized the importance of player safety, particularly for McAvoy.
Boston Bruins fans express concern over McAvoy's health following the incident.

articles.title: Derrick White, short-handed Celtics claim one of season’s best wins over Rockets: 8 takeaways
articles.description:
On a night when the Celtics were led by one of the most unassuming stars in the NBA, they played one of their more cohesive, egalitarian games in recent memory. 

The post Derrick White, short-handed Celtics claim one of season’s best wins over Rockets: 8 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics secured a significant win against the Rockets, showcasing team cohesion.
Derrick White led the team, contributing to one of their best performances this season.
This victory boosts Celtics' morale and playoff positioning for Boston fans.
